players.name: Bob
memory: You: "Let's figure out what happened to Alice."
Diana: "I investigated Charlie last night and he is the mafioso. We need to vote him out."
Charlie: "Diana is lying. I'm the detective and I investigated Bob last night - he's innocent. Diana must be the mafioso trying to frame me."
Diana: "Charlie is lying. I am the detective and my investigation proves he is mafioso. Bob is innocent. Vote Charlie to win."
Charlie: "Diana is the real mafioso. I investigated Bob - he's innocent. Diana is trying to frame me because I'm the detective. Vote Diana to win."
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
